amendment.description: To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Navy, up to $1,000,000 for Energy Regeneration and Conversion Fuel Cell Systems to address Navy Unmanned Underwater Vehicle requirements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4855 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4855 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Dodd. (consideration: CR S8703-8705; text: CR S8704) To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Navy, up to $1,000,000 for Energy Regeneration and Conversion Fuel Cell Systems to address Navy Unmanned Underwater Vehicle requirements.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4855 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4855 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Dodd.
